architectural_elements.name: Stone Walls
architectural_elements.description: Rough, damp stone bricks covered in moss and dark stains, some stones slightly loose.

architectural_elements.name: Arched Ceiling
architectural_elements.description: Low, vaulted arches with iron support beams, dripping condensation.

architectural_elements.name: Iron Door
architectural_elements.description: Heavy, rusted door with a small barred window. It groans loudly when opened.

architectural_elements.name: Stone Floor
architectural_elements.description: Cold stone slabs with cracks and patches of pooled water or blood.

architectural_elements.name: Narrow Staircase
architectural_elements.description: Steep stone steps leading up to the mansion, with a metal railing slick with rust.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wooden Workbench
furniture_and_decor.description: A sturdy table covered in old tools, broken bottles, and dark stains.

furniture_and_decor.name: Iron Chains
furniture_and_decor.description: Rusted chains hanging from the ceiling and walls, some still attached to shackles.

furniture_and_decor.name: Storage Shelves
furniture_and_decor.description: Rotting wooden shelves lined with jars of strange substances and forgotten relics.

furniture_and_decor.name: Barred Cell
furniture_and_decor.description: A small cage-like cell with an open door, straw bedding, and scratch marks on the walls.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wooden Barrels
furniture_and_decor.description: Old barrels leaking water or unknown fluids, stacked in dark corners.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick webs hanging from the ceiling beams and corners, glistening in the dim light.

atmospheric_details.name: Dripping Water
atmospheric_details.description: Constant dripping from unseen leaks, echoing through the chamber.

atmospheric_details.name: Rats
atmospheric_details.description: Small rodents darting between cracks and shadows, their squeaks echoing faintly.

atmospheric_details.name: Mold and Decay
atmospheric_details.description: Patches of green mold and black rot covering wood and stone alike.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Mist
atmospheric_details.description: Thin mist lingering near the floor, moving unnaturally against air currents.

interactive_objects.name: Rusty Key
interactive_objects.description: An old iron key lying on a shelf or hanging from a hook, likely tied to a locked cell.

interactive_objects.name: Bloodstained Note
interactive_objects.description: A torn piece of paper with smeared writing, hinting at what happened down here.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Lantern
interactive_objects.description: A shattered lantern on the ground, its glass scattered and oil spilled.

interactive_objects.name: Torture Chair
interactive_objects.description: A wooden chair fitted with restraints, rusted metal parts, and old blood stains.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Passage Door
interactive_objects.description: A disguised section of wall that can be opened with a lever or key mechanism.

environmental_effects.name: Flickering Torchlight
environmental_effects.description: Dim torches that sputter and fade, causing shadows to dance across the walls.

environmental_effects.name: Echoing Footsteps
environmental_effects.description: Delayed echoes of the playerâ€™s movements, as if something else walks with them.

environmental_effects.name: Chains Clinking
environmental_effects.description: Soft rattling of metal, even when no wind or movement is nearby.

environmental_effects.name: Whispering Voices
environmental_effects.description: Barely audible murmurs that seem to come from behind the walls.

environmental_effects.name: Sudden Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Cold air rushing from unseen cracks or tunnels, extinguishing light sources.

lighting.name: Torchlight
lighting.description: Flickering torches mounted along the walls, their flames weak and unstable.

lighting.name: Lantern Glow
lighting.description: Faint light from an oil lantern placed on a table or hanging from a hook.

lighting.name: Moonlight Through Grate
lighting.description: Thin beams of pale light shining through a ceiling grate or drain cover.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Small candles melted into strange shapes, clustered near an altar or cell door.
